name: CloneBox
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

A 2D platformer game where you play as a box that can change shape to either a tall box or a wide box. When you die, a clone of you spawns in the location of your death and they can help you to escape.

Controls:

  • Movement: AD or Arrow keys
  • Jump:  W or Space
  • Change Shape: E
  • Remove all clones: R

This game was made by ManuDMF and PuffDev
